title: A compendious treatise in metre declaring the firste originall of sacrifice, and of the buylding of aultares and churches, and of the firste receauinge of the Christen fayth here in Englande by G.M.
author: Marshall, George, poet.
publisher: In ædibus lohannis [sic] Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis],
notes: G.M. = George Marshall, whose name appears in an acrostic on A1v.
Identified as STC 17469a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
